parties.terms: Cross Default: Cross Default will apply to Party B and for the purposes of which the Threshold Amount will be 3% of its Net Asset Value. Additional definitions: “Net Asset Value” means the assets of Party B less the liabilities of Party B (as determined by reference to the most recent accounts). Credit Event upon merger: Credit Event upon Merger Applicable to Party B

Cross Default: Cross Default will apply to Party B and for the purposes of which the Threshold Amount will be 5% of its Net Asset Value. Additional definitions: “Net Asset Value” means the gross assets of Party B less the liabilities of Party B (as determined by reference to the most recent accounts). Credit Event upon merger: Credit Event upon Merger Not Applicable to Party B

Cross Default: Cross Default will apply to Party B and for the purposes of which the Threshold Amount will be GBP 5,000,000. Additional definitions: Not Applicable Credit Event upon merger: Credit Event upon Merger Not Applicable to Party B
Cross Default: Cross Default will not apply to Party B. Additional definitions: Not Applicable Credit Event upon merger: Credit Event upon Merger Applicable to Party B

Cross Default: Cross Default will apply to Party B and for the purposes of which the Threshold Amount will be 3% of its Net Asset Value. Additional definitions: “Net Asset Value” means the assets of Party B less the liabilities of Party B (as determined by reference to the most recent accounts). Credit Event upon merger: Credit Event upon Merger Not Applicable to Party B
